entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
